Uses of Package
services

Packages that use services
manager   
 

Classes in services used by manager
LCDInfo
          Prints Information to the LCD display of the NXT.
Localization
          Localization handles all initial localization needs, both Ultrasonic and Line localization.
Mapper
          The mapper service was intended to be used to map the field and discover the important points to investigate further.
Navigation
          Navigates the robot along a route, which is contained in this class the route is set by the search and drop off controllers.
ObstacleAvoidance
          The following controller performs obstacle avoidance by scanning with the ultrasonic sensors.
Odometer
          Odometer -> keeps track of the robot's current position modified from the odometer code given in Lab 4
OdometryCorrection
          OdometryCorrection makes use of the LinePoller, each time a new line is detected, it will record the position of the odometer and what sensor detected the line.
